description: Organize a messy downloads directory by creating typed subdirectories, moving and renaming files by extension, deleting empty/whitespace-only files, and generating an inventory report.

meta_data.stateContent:
file_management/
├── Sales Report.csv
├── monthly_report.csv
├── Data Export.csv
├── empty_file.csv
├── Config Settings.json
├── api_response.json
├── summary.JSON
├── USER_LOG.txt
├── NOTES.txt
├── Meeting Notes.TXT
├── blank.txt
├── README.md

environment.notes: File sizes calculated as bytes/1024 (binary KB). Tested on Windows 10/11. Works on Linux/macOS without modification.
